title: mOna nisiyinilE
sahitya:
mOna nishiyinilE gAnam sheivadu nIyO 



anupallavi



nAnarat-tAnenrezhum jnAnap-param poruLE



caraNam



Anavap-pEi manam aDangi yurangum vELai ajnAna bandhamiri amaidi

shiranda vELai

vInaiyum kuzhalum pOl vEda mantiramum pOl virumbi en uLLattil karumbin aruviyaippOl
